Public MustInherit Class WizardStepBase Inherits View

summary.span: 实现 控件中一个步骤所需的基本功能。

span.span: Implements the basic functionality required by a step in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能直接创建类的实例 。You cannot directly create an instance of the class. 相反，此类由 类和类继承， 以提供用作向导的控件中某个步骤的基本功能。Instead, this class is inherited by the class and the class to provide the basic functionality of a step in a control that acts as a wizard. 可以从 类派生，以创建一个自定义类，该类表示向导控件中的唯一步骤。You can derive from the class to create a custom class that represents a unique step in a wizard control.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否允许用户从 集合中后面的步骤返回当前步骤。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user is allowed to return to the current step from a subsequent step in a collection.

value.span: 如果允许用户返回当前步骤，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user is allowed to return to the current step; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可用于在控件中强制执行线性导航 。The property can be used to enforce linear navigation in a control. 如果每个步骤都将其 属性设置为 `false` ，则在访问某个步骤后，用户将无法返回到该步骤。If each step has its property set to `false`, the user will not be able to return to a step after it has been accessed. 您可以使用此功能的一种情况是，禁止用户在步骤完成后返回到某个步骤，因为在每个步骤完成时，您将数据保存到数据库中。One scenario where you might use this functionality is to disallow a user to return to a step after it has been completed because you are persisting the data to a database as each step is completed. 如果在每个步骤之后保存数据，并允许用户在保存后返回到步骤并更改信息，则保存的数据可能会损坏。If you save the data after each step and allow the user to return to a step and change information after it has been saved, the saved data might become corrupted. 通过将 属性设置为 `false` ，一旦用户离开某个步骤，他或她将无法返回到该步骤并更改任何值。By setting the property to `false`, once the user has left a step, he or she will not be able to return to it and change any values. 属性确定如何以及何时不呈现 "**上一步**" 按钮。The property determines how and when the **Previous** button is not rendered. 下表描述了 **上一个** 按钮的呈现行为。The following table describes the **Previous** button rendering behavior. |场景Scenario|行为Behavior| |--------------|--------------| |线性：步骤 1 设置为 `false` ，用户操作转到步骤2。Linear: Step1 has set to `false` and user action goes to step 2.|步骤2不显示 " **上一** 步" 按钮。Step 2 does not display the **Previous** button.| |非线性：步骤 1 设置为 `false` ，用户操作转到步骤3。Non-Linear: Step1 has set to `false` and user action goes to step 3.|步骤3不显示 " **上一** 步" 按钮。Step 3 does not display the **Previous** button.| |侧栏按钮：步骤 2 设置为 `false` ， 设置为 `true` ，用户单击侧栏按钮。SideBar Buttons: Step 2 has set to `false` , is set to `true`, and a user clicks on the SideBar button.|当设置为时，不会在边栏上自动禁用任何按钮 `false` 。No buttons are automatically disabled on the sidebar when is set to `false`. 如果用户单击该按钮，则将忽略该操作。If a user clicks the button, the action is ignored.| |使用自定义模板的线性 & 非线性：该步骤具有自定义导航模板。Linear & Non-Linear with Custom Template: The step has a custom navigation template.|如果 `false` 使用模板进行导航时设置为，则不会发生自动隐藏或显示。No automatic hiding or displaying occurs if is set to `false` when you use a template for navigation. " **上一步** " 按钮在模板上应是可选的。The **Previous** button should be optional on the template.| |使用 Visual Studio 设计器和 ：控件有5个步骤，你在步骤4中执行操作，并且运行页面。Using the Visual Studio Designer and : The control has 5 steps, you are working on step 4, and you run the page.|如果步骤4为 ，则呈现 " **上一** 步" 按钮。When step 4 is the , then the **Previous** button is rendered. " **上一** 步" 按钮仅在 历史记录中的上一步设置为时隐藏，并设置为 `false` 。The **Previous** button is only hidden for set to when the preceding step in the history has set to `false`. 由于首先呈现步骤4，并且历史记录中没有任何步骤，所以 " **上一** 步" 按钮不会隐藏。Since step 4 is rendered first and there are no steps in the history, the **Previous** button is not hidden.| |开始单步执行和非线性导航：用户访问步骤3和步骤4，然后使用 设置为的步骤 1 。Start Step and Non-Linear Navigation: A user visits step 3 and step 4 and then step 1 which has set to .|当设置为时，向导不会添加 " **上一** 步" 按钮 ，而不管用户如何导航到该步骤。The wizard does not add a **Previous** button when the is set to regardless of how the user navigates to that step.| |历史记录中的相同步骤：用户访问步骤3，其中 设置为 ，用户不提交其操作。Same Step In History: A user visits step 3 where is set to and the user does not commit their actions. 然后，在步骤3中单击 "上一步" 按钮。They then click on the previous button on step 3.|向导控件会检查历史记录中的 **上一个** 步骤是否为用户当前所处的 "相同" 步骤。The wizard control checks to see if the **Previous** step in the history is the "same" step that the user is currently on. 如果步骤相同，向导控件会返回历史记录以确定前面的 "不同" 步骤，并基于历史记录中的 "不同步骤" 来确定 **上一个** 按钮和目标的显示结果。If the step is the same, the wizard control looks back in the history to determine the preceding "different" step and bases the display of the **Previous** button and destination based on the "different step" in the history.| > [!NOTE] > 当 属性设置为时 `false` ，但的 父控件的属性 设置为时 `true` ，单击侧栏区域中的按钮不起作用。When the property is set to `false`, but the property of the parent control of is set to `true`, clicking on a button in the sidebar area has no effect. 通常会显示侧栏区域来提供非线性导航，因此，如果未使用非线性导航功能，则可能需要将 属性设置为 `false` 。The sidebar area is generally displayed to provide nonlinear navigation, so if you are not using the functionality of nonlinear navigation, you may want to set the property to `false`. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性在访问控件后阻止用户返回到控件中的某个步骤 。The following example demonstrates using the property to stop the user from returning to a step in the control after it has been accessed. 在此示例中，该 `Step1` 步骤的 属性已设置为 `false` 。In the example, the `Step1` step has its property set to `false`. 用户离开该步骤后 `Step1` ，步骤中将不显示 "上一步" 按钮 `Step2` 。After the user leaves the `Step1` step, no Previous button appears on the `Step2` step. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseAllowReturn#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseAllowReturn/CS/wizardstepbaseallowreturncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseAllowReturn#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseAllowReturn/VB/wizardstepbaseallowreturnvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示主题是否应用于该控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether themes apply to this control.

value.span: 如果使用主题，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to use themes; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否为控件启用主题 。The property indicates whether themes are enabled for the control. 属性还会影响是否为其 controls 集合中包含的控件启用主题。The property also affects whether themes are enabled for the controls contained in its controls collection. 当 属性为时 `true` ，将在应用程序的主题目录中搜索要应用的控件外观。When the property is `true`, the application's theme directory is searched for control skins to apply. 如果主题目录中不存在特定控件的外观，则不会应用外观。If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, a skin is not applied. 当 属性为时 `false` ，不会搜索主题目录，也 不会使用属性的值。When the property is `false`, the theme directory is not searched and the value of the property is not used. 控件可以重写 其父控件或由包含页设置的值。A control can override the value set by its parent control or by the containing page. 例如，如果 控件已 设置为 `false` ，则可以通过 `true` 在各个子控件上将属性设置为，来有选择地将主题应用到向导步骤中包含的子控件。For example, if a control has set to `false`, you can selectively apply themes to child controls contained within the wizard step by setting the property to `true` on the individual child controls.

related.span: 向导 Web 服务器控件

summary.span: 获取或设置分配给服务器控件的编程标识符。

span.span: Gets or sets the programmatic identifier assigned to the server control.

value.span: 分配给控件的编程标识符。

span.span: The programmatic identifier assigned to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可在 Web 窗体页中标识和引用特定的向导步骤控件。Use the property to identify and reference a particular wizard step control in a Web Forms page. 此值将成为页面中控件实例的名称; 这使你可以轻松访问该页面的代码中的特定步骤。The value becomes the name of the control instance in the page; this allows you to easily access a particular step in code for that page. 例如，如果将 控件的属性设置 为 "步骤 1"，则可以将该页面的代码中的子控件引用为 `Step1.Controls` 。For example, if you set the property of a control to "Step1", you can reference the child controls of the wizard step in code for that page as `Step1.Controls`. 当在设计时添加或修改步骤时，控件可确保控件中的每个步骤都具有有效的唯一标识符。The control ensures that each step in a control has a valid unique identifier when steps are added or modified at design time. 例如，当你 在设计时设置一个步骤时，它不能与控件中包含的另一步骤的标识符匹配 ，并且它无法与 包含控件的匹配 。For example, when you set the for a step at design time, it cannot match the identifier for another step contained in the control, and it cannot match the for the containing control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例为 Web 窗体页中的控件定义了三个向导步骤。The following code example defines three wizard steps for a control in a Web Forms page. 在该页的代码中，向导步骤实例按其 ID 值命名，并且可以在代码中引用 `WizardStep1` 、 `WizardStep2` 和 `WizardStep3` 。In code for the page, the wizard step instances are named by their ID values, and they can be referenced in the code as `WizardStep1`, `WizardStep2`, and `WizardStep3`. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStep#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStep/CS/wizardactivestepcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStep#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStep/VB/wizardactivestepvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 此属性在设计时设置为无效的标识符字符串。

span.span: The property was set to an invalid identifier string at design time.
-or-

exception.span: 此属性在设计时设置为与包含 控件相同的标识符。

span.span: The property was set to the same identifier as the containing control at design time.
-or-

exception.span: 此属性在设计时设置为与包含 控件中的另一个步骤相同的标识符。

span.span: The property was set to the same identifier as another step in the containing control at design time.

summary.span: 获取与用作向导的控件中的某个步骤关联的名称。

span.span: Gets the name associated with a step in a control that acts as a wizard.

value.span: 与用作向导的控件中的某个步骤关联的名称。

span.span: The name associated with a step in a control that acts as a wizard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回一个字符串，该字符串标识向导控件中的步骤。The property returns a string that identifies a step in a wizard control. 如果为属性指定了值 ，则属性将 返回该值。If a value is specified for the property, the property returns that value. 如果没有为属性指定任何值 ，则 属性将返回属性的值 。If no value is specified for the property, the property returns the value of the property. 如果没有为 或属性指定值 ，则 属性将返回 `null` 。If values are not specified for either the or the property, the property returns `null`.

member this.StepType : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要为 控件中某个步骤显示的导航用户界面 (UI) 的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of navigation user interface (UI) to display for a step in a control.
One of the enumeration values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定为控件中的步骤显示的导航按钮的类型 。Use the property to specify the type of navigation buttons to display for a step in a control. 如果为此属性指定一个值，则任何标记为的步骤会在 侧栏的禁用状态下显示。If you specify a value for this property, any steps marked as displays in a disabled state in the sidebar. 如果未指定此属性的值，则默认值为 `WizardStepType.Auto` 。If you do not specify a value for this property, the default is `WizardStepType.Auto`. 下表列出了属性的可用设置 和该步骤生成的行为：The following table lists the available settings for the property and the resulting behavior of the step: `WizardStepType.Auto` 为步骤呈现的导航 UI 由声明该步骤的顺序确定。The navigation UI that is rendered for the step is determined by the order in which the step is declared. `WizardStepType.Complete` 该步骤是要显示的最后一个步骤。The step is the last one to appear. 不呈现任何导航按钮。No navigation buttons are rendered. `WizardStepType.Finish` 该步骤是最终数据收集步骤。The step is the final data collection step. 呈现 "完成" 和 "上一个" 按钮以便导航。The Finish and Previous buttons are rendered for navigation. `WizardStepType.Start` 该步骤是要显示的第一个步骤。The step is the first one to appear. 不呈现 "上一步" 按钮。A Previous button is not rendered. `WizardStepType.Step` 步骤是开始和完成步骤之间的任何步骤。The step is any step between the Start and the Finish step. 呈现用于导航的“上一步”和“下一步”按钮。Previous and Next buttons are rendered for navigation. 此步骤类型对于重写 步骤类型非常有用。This step type is useful for overriding the step type.

exception.span: 所选的值不是 枚举值之一。

span.span: The selected value is not one of the enumeration values.

related.span: 向导 Web 服务器控件

span.span: Wizard Web Server Control

summary.span: 获取或设置在启用侧栏功能时，要用于 控件中某个步骤的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the title to use for a step in a control when the sidebar feature is enabled.

value.span: 在启用侧栏功能时，要用于 控件中某个步骤的标题。

span.span: The title to use for a step in a control when the sidebar feature is enabled.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当启用侧栏功能时，可以使用属性来显示控件中某个步骤的用户友好标题。Use the property to display a user-friendly title for a step in a control when the sidebar feature is enabled. 如果 未设置该属性，并且启用了边栏功能，则将 显示侧栏按钮的属性值。If the property is not set and the sidebar feature is enabled, the value of the property is displayed for the sidebar button. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性为控件中的步骤显示用户友好的标题 。The following example demonstrates using the property to display a user-friendly title for a step in the control. 在此示例中，没有 `Step1` 设置其 属性，因此它在控件中显示 为 "WizardStep1"。In the example, `Step1` does not have its property set, so it appears in the control as "WizardStep1". `Step2` 已设置其 属性，因此它显示为 "步骤 2"。`Step2` does have its property set, so it appears as "Step 2". [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseTitle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseTitle/CS/wizardstepbasetitlecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseTitle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseTitle/VB/wizardstepbasetitlevb.aspx#1)]
